cats.name: pepper
cats.description: Pepper is old and shaped like a barrel.

cats.name: lemon
cats.description: Lemon is old, orange and grumpy.  She likes Charlotte, but not really anyone else.

cats.name: goku
cats.description: Honestly our database doesn't have much info on Goku...only that he is black andterrified of literally everything.  And he's got a cool name.

cats.name: wasabi
cats.description: Wasabi is an adorable black kitty who loves playing with trash and definitely sees demons at night.

cats.name: poppy
cats.description: Poppy is a fluffy (slightly overweight but we don't talk about it) white kitty who has funny eyes and loooovves hard pets.

cats.name: clover
cats.description: Clovey Baloney is an orange tabby-cat who screams constantly and loves human food.

cats.name: ivy
cats.description: Ivy is a racoon-lookin-ass scaredy cat who bites elbows and hides under the bed for 3-5 business hours if she hears any noise above 10 decibels.

cats.name: gura
cats.description: Gura is a fatass white cat who will stop at nothing to obtain her next meal...even if it's you.
